newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish Feb-April industrial sales up 3 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Danish Feb-April industrial sales up 3 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Danish industrial sales rose three percent and orders six percent in February-April 1997 compared to the same 1996 period, the national statistics bureau said on Wednesday.

The manufacturing price index rose by one percent in February-April compared to the same period a year ago, while the quantity index, indicating trends in turnover of goods and services, was also one percent higher on a year-on-year basis.
